txt.en: 'Well done. Now we shall have an easier time chasing the Corsairs out.'
The barricades in Abadec's Watch have granted the Corsairs a sense of security.

'While Abadec's Watch will never return to its former strength, we cannot allow the Corsairs to continue like this.\n\n'Destroy the barricades that they have constructed, and those crumbling ruin walls will seem a little less sturdy than they once appeared.'
Talk to Dolvir outside Abadec's Watch
You have destroyed many barricades in Abadec's Watch.\n\nDolvir waits for you amongst the trees to the north of the camp. You should talk to him.
Dolvir has asked you to destroy barricades at Abadec's Watch.\n\nAbadec's Watch is located in the south-west corner of Belfalas.
